pages.text: To visit this horrifying hellscape, $(action)create a portal$() with $(item)Obsidian$() and activate it with a $(item)Flint & Steel$(). This is nothing new - but what you find on the other side might be. $(place)The Nether$() here is no monotonous netherrack cavern swamped by lava - in its depths you can now find new trees and plant life, frozen wastelands, infectious $(entity)Creepers$() and reigning $(entity)Ghast Queens$(), pools of $(item)Flaming Pyrotheum$()

At least 10 $(item)Obsidian$() are required to build a proper portal. The corner blocks are not integral to the functionality of the portal, however it is recommended to place something there for stability purposes.$(br2)Once the frame is in place, it can be activated with a $(item)Flint & Steel$(). Then, one must step inside, but slowly, for interdimensional travel tends to be dizzying, and one wishes to arrive in a single piece.
